---
id: create-portal-link
title: "Create a link for the organization's admin portal"
description: "Create a link for this organizations admin portal. This link encodes an action token on behalf of the organization's default admin user, or the user that is optionally specified in this request. The user specified must be a member of this organization, and have full organization admin roles."
sidebar_label: "Create a link for the organization's admin portal"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "post api-method"
info_path: api//phase-two-admin-rest-api
custom_edit_url: null
---

import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";
import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import SecuritySchemes from "@theme/ApiExplorer/SecuritySchemes";
import MimeTabs from "@theme/MimeTabs";
import ParamsItem from "@theme/ParamsItem";
import ResponseSamples from "@theme/ResponseSamples";
import SchemaItem from "@theme/SchemaItem";
import SchemaTabs from "@theme/SchemaTabs";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create a link for the organization's admin portal"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/{realm}/orgs/{orgId}/portal-link"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Create a link for this organizations admin portal. This link encodes an action token on behalf of the organization's default admin user, or the user that is optionally specified in this request. The user specified must be a member of this organization, and have full organization admin roles.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}}

  open={true}
>

    >

    </h3>
  </summary><div>
    <ul>
      <ParamsItem
        className={"paramsItem"}
        param={{"in":"path","name":"realm","description":"realm name (not id!)","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"style":"simple"}}
      >
        
      </ParamsItem><ParamsItem
        className={"paramsItem"}
        param={{"in":"path","name":"orgId","description":"organization id","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"style":"simple"}}
      >
